channel.title: Serial landing page teardown
channel.description:
http://justinjackson.ca/serial/
Liked this landing page breakdown by @mijustin. We often see these things around products which are big complicated things. A teardown around a podcast is a nice simple use case that makes several points very clear.

item.title: Serial landing page teardown
item.dc:creator: kalenjordan
item.description:
Love it, Justin! Nice work!

Read full topic

item.title: Serial landing page teardown
item.dc:creator: mijustin
item.description:
Thanks @ian!

The best part of this teardown was doing my initial draft, and then getting input from the community on Twitter, my email newsletter, and Designer News.

I think I could actually do a few more iterations based on the conversations so far. The biggest thing I’d like to do is actually A/B test these. Unfortunately, that’s not really possible with a 3rd party site.

I’m planning on doing more of these in the future here: landingpageteardown.com

Read full topic
